instructions:
1 can 15.5 oz. whole tomatoes
1 can 15.5 oz. pinto beans *(Glory)*
1 can 15.5 oz Chili Beans in chili sauce *(Bush)*
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar

In a Dutch oven cook half of the bacon until crisp and remove. Add remaining bacon, beef and 1 Tbsp.
chili powder cook over medium heat until beef is browned. Reduce heat add onions and ½ garlic stir and
cook until onions is tender. Add undrained whole tomatoes, beans, 1 tsp. cumin and 1 Tbsp. chili powder.
Bring to boil and reduce heat. Simmer covered for one hour stirring occasionally. Stir in remaining garlic
and simmer covered one hour. Add water for desired consistency and season to taste. Serve in bowl
topped with crumbled bacon, cheddar cheese and chopped sweet onions. *(Serves 2 to 4)*.
ingredients: 4 slices of bacon cut to ½ inch
1 lb. beef stew cut to bite size
1 large onion sliced ½ inch thick
name: Winter Woods Chili
